title: An old video is being shared as ‘Rishi Kapoor with hospital staff on his last day’
subtitle: Rishi Kapoor has died with Leukemia on 30 April 2020 at the Sir HN Reliance Foundation Hospital in Mumbai. But the video is found to exist on the internet at least since 3 February 2020.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video of Rishi Kapoor in the hospital with a man singing a song is being shared as that of his last day at the hospital before his death. The video shows a man singing the song ‘Tere Dard Se Dil Abaad Raha’ from the Rishi Kapoor starrer ‘Deewana’ movie. But, FACTLY has found the video to be at least two months old. The video is found to exist on the internet at least since 3 February 2020. Rishi Kapoor died of Leukemia on 30 April 2020 at the Sir HN Reliance Foundation Hospital in Mumbai.
